assessment_item.title: ಕಾನ್ಪುರದಲ್ಲಿ ದಂಗೆ ಎದ್ದ ನಾಯಕರು
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ಕಾನ್ಪುರದಲ್ಲಿ ದಂಗೆ ಎದ್ದ ನಾಯಕರು

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ನಾನಾ ಸಾಹೇಬ ಮತ್ತು ಮಂಗಲಪಾಂಡೆ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1295"},{"text":"

ನಾನಾ ಸಾಹೇಬ ಮತ್ತು ತಾತ್ಯಾಟೋಪಿ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1296"},{"text":"

ತಾತ್ಯಾಟೋಪಿ ಮತ್ತು ಮಂಗಲಪಾಂಡೆ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1306"},{"text":"

ಬಹದ್ದೂರ್ ಶಾ ಮತ್ತು ತಾತ್ಯಾಟೋಪಿ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1311"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"ಕಾನ್ಪುರದಲ್ಲಿ ದಂಗೆ ಎದ್ದ ನಾಯಕರು ","title":"ಕಾನ್ಪುರದಲ್ಲಿ ದಂಗೆ ಎದ್ದ ನಾಯಕರು ","board":"State (Karnataka)","medium":"Kannada","gradeLevel":["Class 10"],"subject":"Social Studies","qlevel":"EASY","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
